Detailed Description

Special class for creating Components.

This class provides an interface for creating different kinds of Components. Subclasses of this class can be added to the SceneManager using the registerComponentType method. Each Component class should have its own corresponding ComponentCreator subclass.

See also:
SceneManager::registerComponentType(std::string typeName, ComponentCreator* creator)
